Name: Arcana Pack
Effect: Choose 1 of up to 3 Tarot cards to be used immediately

Name: Jumbo Arcana Pack
Effect: Choose 1 of up to 5 Tarot cards to be used immediately

Name: Mega Arcana Pack
Effect: Choose 2 of up to 5 Tarot cards to be used immediately

Name: Celestial Pack
Effect: Choose 1 of up to 3 Planet cards to be used immediately

Name: Jumbo Celestial Pack
Effect: Choose 1 of up to 5 Planet cards to be used immediately

Name: Mega Celestial Pack
Effect: Choose 2 of up to 5 Planet cards to be used immediately

Name: Standard Pack
Effect: Choose 1 of up to 3 Playing cards to add to your deck

Name: Jumbo Standard Pack
Effect: Choose 1 of up to 5 Playing cards to add to your deck

Name: Mega Standard Pack
Effect: Choose 2 of up to 5 Playing cards to add to your deck

Name: Buffoon Pack
Effect: Choose 1 of up to 2 Joker cards

Name: Jumbo Buffoon Pack
Effect: Choose 1 of up to 4 Joker cards

Name: Mega Buffoon Pack
Effect: Choose 2 of up to 4 Joker cards

Name: Spectral Pack
Effect: Choose 1 of up to 2 Spectral cards to be used immediately

Name: Jumbo Spectral Pack
Effect: Choose 1 of up to 4 Spectral cards to be used immediately

Name: Mega Spectral Pack
Effect: Choose 2 of up to 4 Spectral cards to be used immediately
